versionA.text:
A researcher is trying to estimate the average number of children born to couples who do not practice birth control. The mean for a random sample of 150 such couples is 5.4. 
  
 Find the 95% confidence interval for the mean (μ) of all couples not practicing birth control.

versionB.text:
A researcher is trying to estimate the average number of children born to couples who do not practice birth control. The standard deviation for a random sample of 150 such couples is 2. 
 
 Find the 95% confidence interval for the mean (μ) of all couples not practicing birth control.
